answers.answer: Yep. I'm due any day and it puts me in tears just turning over in bed. This is my 3rd so I never get to lay down and relax or nap. My feet, legs and hands are so swollen they look like there gonna pop and it hurts to walk. I got morning sickness back and I have pelvic girdle syndrome. In so much pain everyday. Never been more excited to not be pregnant. Just wanna feel normal again.
Yup I'm 32 weeks and I enjoy being cute with my bump but it's huge now.  my back hurts and sometimes when he moves it hurts and on top of that I'm TIRED AF

This is my second pregnancy. I had my first son at 36 weeks due to preeclampsia. I never felt my first pregnancy like I do this one. I feel EVERYTHING!!! It hurts!! Plus he is huge. I am measuring 3 weeks ahead.

question: 45 more days to go and my body couldn't be more ready. I'm tired of hurting and not being able to do what I did 8 and a half months ago. I'm so ready for these next 6 weeks to go by. I am miserable and I feel so sickly. With the lack of sleep and achy back I am absolutely miserable. He needs to stay in longer because I will be 34 weeks Tuesday. Anyone else in the same boat?
title: Miserable!!!!!
